name: Frog Force: The Power of Friendship
name_original: Frog Force: The Power of Friendship
description:
CONTROLS - LEFT / RIGHT, SPACEBAR

The Frog Force is made up of a trio of defenders for Pondopolis, a city currently being leveled by the latest big bad monster of the week, KingFisher. Join forces with the froggy-themed friends in the cockpit of their giant mecha as they battle both the city's demons and their inner ones as well. They're froggy teens with attitudes- and anxiety! Take on the important role of leader to highfive, fistbump, and hype your friends up to victory! Leaving a teammate hanging for a high-five could mean literal disaster for the citizens of Pondopolis, and even worse- social embarrassment for your friend!

Players will need to pay close attention to the visual and verbal social cues of their teammates during battle to provide specific and timely support to raise their Friendship Power meter to unleash a Super Froggy Special Move to end the battle against KingFisher! The support action the player must perform will depend on the teammate's social cue. Did a teammate raise their hand to you for a high-five? Don't leave them hanging! 

Art / Director - DaddyDemus#1374

Coding - Fort3x#5419, Boy#4656

Music - SavestateCorrupted#3433 BandCamp / Itch.io / Twitter
